name: ARSession.RunOptions
desc: Options for transitioning an AR session's current state when you change its configuration.

items.name: static var resetTracking: ARSession.RunOptions
items.desc: An option to reset the device's position from the session's previous run.

items.name: static var removeExistingAnchors: ARSession.RunOptions
items.desc: An option to remove any anchor objects associated with the session's previous run.

items.name: static var stopTrackedRaycasts: ARSession.RunOptions
items.desc: An option to stop all active tracked raycasts.

items.name: static var resetSceneReconstruction: ARSession.RunOptions
items.desc: An option to reset the scene mesh.
